message: I use django-pagination http://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-pagination for all my projects. Then the other day I was wondering if there is some other good solution for this need. I checked https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/dev/topics/pagination/  but seems like a partial solution. What's your opinion on this topic, can you share your solution or recommend some other lib?
FWIW we're using django-endless-pagination : django-endless-pagination.readthedocs.org/ which is great whether you're looking for some twitter-like pagination.
I would check and review the packages listed at http://djangopackages.com/grids/g/pagination/
